headline: How New Analyst Views Are Rewriting the Story Behind McDonald's Stock
summary: McDonald's stock narrative has been subtly recalibrated, with the fair value estimate edging slightly lower as analysts balance enthusiasm for long term brand strength against near term traffic and value mix uncertainties. A marginal uptick in the discount rate and a small trim to expected revenue growth reflect this more cautious stance, even as long range compounding potential remains firmly in focus. Read on to see how these quiet shifts in assumptions can reshape the story around the...
